javadoc: Component that displays merge components as needed.

methods.name: setApplyEnabled
methods.comment:
Enables/disables the Apply button at the bottom of the merge tool.
 The Apply button is for applying conflicts.

params.name: state
params.comment: true means enable the button. false means disable it.

methods.name: setMergeComponent
methods.comment: Defines and displays a component for resolving merge conflicts.

methods.javadoc:
Removes use of a component for resolving merge conflicts.
@param component the component
methods.name: removeMergeComponent
methods.comment: Removes use of a component for resolving merge conflicts.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the merge description at the top of the merge tool.
@param description the description
methods.name: updateMergeDescription
methods.comment: Sets the merge description at the top of the merge tool.

methods.javadoc: Displays the default information in the merge tool.
methods.name: showDefaultComponent
methods.comment: Displays the default information in the merge tool.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the percentage of the progress meter that is filled in for the current phase progress area.
@param currentPercentProgress the percentage of the progress bar to fill in from 0 to 100.
methods.name: setCurrentProgress
methods.comment: Sets the percentage of the progress meter that is filled in for the current phase progress area.

params.name: currentPercentProgress
params.comment: the percentage of the progress bar to fill in from 0 to 100.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the title for the current phase progress area.
@param newTitle the new title
methods.name: updateProgressTitle
methods.comment: Sets the title for the current phase progress area.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the message below the progress meter in the current phase progress area.
@param message the new text message to display. If null, then the default message is displayed.
methods.name: updateProgressDetails
methods.comment: Sets the message below the progress meter in the current phase progress area.

params.name: message
params.comment: the new text message to display. If null, then the default message is displayed.

name: MergeManagerProvider
comment: Component that displays merge components as needed.
